keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to protect local businesses and families from the impact of Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect local hospital services and increase funding for the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Need to keep health care local and properly fund our NHS and care systems.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight funding cuts for schools and the selection agenda
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for more money for our schools against making any of our schools second rate.
Fight to reduce air pollution and to keep current standards of environmental protection.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Build more homes and fight homelessness
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Housing costs are too high and we need more public housing.

housing.content: Housing costs are too high and we need more public housing.
